markdown:
{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Degnos |image = Portrait_Degnos_Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Degnos.png |caption = |race = Elf |subrace = Wood |gender = Male |culture = [The Vailian Republics](/theVailianRepublics/) |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = |class = Rogue |level = 1 |MIG = 10 |CON = 10 |DEX = 11 |PER = 11 |INT = 11 |RES = 10 |health = 40 |damage = 5-8 {{crush}} |accuracy = 21 |penetration = 7 |deflection = 20 |fortitude = 15 |reflex = 34 |will = 22 |dr = 3 |ability = [Wily Step](/wilyStep/), [Sneak Attack](/sneakAttackDeadfire/), [Escape](/escapeDeadfire/) |location = [Periki's Overlook](/perikisOverlook/)
[Queen's Berth](/queensBerth/), after starting [Sealed Fate](/sealedFate/)
[Old City Overlook](/oldCityOverlook/), see interactions |quests = [Sealed Fate](/sealedFate/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |body = Vailian Clothing (Deadfire){{!}}Vailian Clothing |internalname = NPC_Degnos |guid = 052543ef-26ec-4d10-b01f-e15ecad40724 }} '''Degnos''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background A Vailian sailor down on his luck, Degnos needs to find his satchel in the luminous bathhouse, but without his captain present, the guards consider him little more than a thief. He loiters outside, trying to find someone who can help him. Of course, once you talk to the proprietor, he will reveal that Degnos tried to sneak into one of the rooms, telling a sob story in a lame attempt to avoid a ban. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = [Sealed Fate](/sealedFate/) |quests_involved = |none = |other = * After completing the quest, if you revealed his betrayal to [Avetta](/avetta/), he will flee to the [Old City Overlook](/oldCityOverlook/). His corpse can be found near the lower center portion of the map. }} ## =Quests = * [Sealed Fate](/sealedFate/): He asks you to retrieve his satchel. ## Gallery PE2_Degnos_Dead.png | He didn't last too long... [Category:Periki's Overlook characters](/categoryPerikisOverlookCharacters/) [Category:Queen's Berth characters](/categoryQueensBerthCharacters/)

{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Degnos |image = Portrait_Degnos_Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Degnos.png |caption = |race = Elf |subrace = Wood |gender = Male |culture = [[The Vailian Republics]] |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = |class = Rogue |level = 1 |MIG = 10 |CON = 10 |DEX = 11 |PER = 11 |INT = 11 |RES = 10 |health = 40 |damage = 5-8 {{crush}} |accuracy = 21 |penetration = 7 |deflection = 20 |fortitude = 15 |reflex = 34 |will = 22 |dr = 3 |ability = [[Wily Step]], [[Sneak Attack (Deadfire)|Sneak Attack]], [[Escape (Deadfire)|Escape]] |location = [[Periki's Overlook]]
[[Queen's Berth]], after starting [[Sealed Fate]]
[[Old City Overlook]], see interactions |quests = [[Sealed Fate]] |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |body = Vailian Clothing (Deadfire){{!}}Vailian Clothing |internalname = NPC_Degnos |guid = 052543ef-26ec-4d10-b01f-e15ecad40724 }} '''Degnos''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ==Background== A Vailian sailor down on his luck, Degnos needs to find his satchel in the luminous bathhouse, but without his captain present, the guards consider him little more than a thief. He loiters outside, trying to find someone who can help him. Of course, once you talk to the proprietor, he will reveal that Degnos tried to sneak into one of the rooms, telling a sob story in a lame attempt to avoid a ban. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = [[Sealed Fate]] |quests_involved = |none = |other = * After completing the quest, if you revealed his betrayal to [[Avetta]], he will flee to the [[Old City Overlook]]. His corpse can be found near the lower center portion of the map. }} ===Quests=== * [[Sealed Fate]]: He asks you to retrieve his satchel. ==Gallery== PE2_Degnos_Dead.png | He didn't last too long... title: Degnos
